recipe.name: Salad: Betty Werre
recipe.preparation:
1. Lettuce cut up - use the amount you need. 2. One large can shrimp 3. Cut up green onions (end and all) 4. One small can peas, drained 5. Avocado 6. Celery - cut up fine 7. Three hard boiled eggs - grated
Prepare lettuce, celery and onion ahead of time, add remaining ingredients when ready to serve.
Coat with mayonnaise and toss when ready to serve.
